data.title: dam : final duel between TotalEnergies/Edf and a
data.meta_description: From the seven consortia competing over the Mphanda Nkuwa dam, two continue to run in the final selection phase for this emblematic project located on the
data.text:
A Franco-Japanese consortium and another mainly comprised of operators from Southern Africa represent the selection of companies participating as a strategic partner for the large-scale 1.5 GW Mphanda Nkuwa Dam project on the River Zambezi in Mozambique, which also involves building 1,300km of high-voltage power lines.

1. Click on at the bottom of your screen.

2. Click on to add AB+ on the home screen.

3. Enter the name of the shortcut and confirm.
